cinimaticCaption.caption: REGRET: This is her?
ARBITER: Yes, Hierarch, this is the one I observed.
REGRET: Such a frail thing.
You would hardly think them a threat.
ANDERS: I demand to know why I'm being held!
ARBITER: Demand?
ELITE: Arbiter, a human ship has arrived
and is closing in on the entrance portal.
ARBITER: Get the Hierarch to High Charity!
Intercept that human ship and destroy it at once!
FORGE: Nothing but ocean.
CUTTER: Are you sure this is it, Serina?
SERINA: Fairly sure. Initiating a deep scan.
Docking? Cleansing? That's not right...
Captain, you're not going to like this!
CUTTER: Serina -
FORGE: Captain! We've got company!
CUTTER: All hands, engage! Serina, I've got troops out there still.
Get them back onboard now!
SERINA: Captain, I can only hold this position a few minutes at the most.
CUTTER: Now, Serina!
SERINA: Recalling surface squads so we can all die together - aye, sir!
